mods.abstract: Shrine in the Temple of Horus at Edfu (Ptolemaic Period); stone doorway with pyramidal roof, winged sun disk upon the lintel, and three columns of hieroglyphs and cartouches down each side set in corner of two walls heavily inscribed with hieroglyphs, cartouches, and images of deities; "860 Edfou le Sanctuaire J.P. Sebah" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of the Friends of Egyptology, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee
